title: 1000+ Sq Ft 2 Bed 2 Bath w. W/D & Central AC | Hudson Yards
posting_body: ["*New this week and won't last long.", 'Video available upon request.', 'Call or Text William - 323.219.4160', 'With over 1,000 square feet, this 2 Bed 1 1/2 Baths, is the perfect retreat within NYC.', 'It features a large walk-in closet, floor to ceiling windows, custom solar shades, solid white oak flooring, 9 feet ceilings, and comes equipped with a stackable washer and dryer.', 'The modern kitchen has a wine refrigerator, CaesarStone countertops, and stainless steel energy-efficient appliances.', 'The baths feature a deep soaking tub and rain showerheads.', 'When it comes to entertaining, the rooftop deck showcases panoramic views of Manhattan and it has its own private screening area to host a moving night.', 'This chic apartment building also has a resident lounge with a pool table and TVs, as well as a private gym with Precor cardio equipment and a yoga studio.', 'THE BUILDING:', 'Bike Room', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Fitness Center', 'Common Outdoor Space', 'Central AC', 'Concierge', 'Billiards Room', 'Fitness Room', 'Pets Allowed', 'Resident Lounge', 'Roof Deck', 'THE LOCATION:', 'Close to the City University of New York, Brooklyn Fare, The Edge, The Vessel, Javitz Center, Times Square, Port Authority, Penn Station, Restaurant Row, Equinox, Hudson Yards, The High Line, Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum, Target, Pier 76, Whole Foods, and easily accessible via the 1, 2, 3, 7, A, C, E, N, Q, R, W, S lines.', '*Photos represent the finishes.', '*1 month broker fee.', '*Call, text, or reply for more information or to schedule a showing.', '(For a faster response please call or text.)', 'William Noorlag | Nest Seekers International', '323.219.4160']
